website_summaries.verdict: A classic shoe, the Keds Crashback Leather has the perfect mix of style and comfort that women may need. It is versatile footwear available at a very budget-friendly rate. With sufficient padding, it fits the bill for long walking, going to the office or running errands, this shoe fits the bill for women of all generations.
pros: The Keds Crashback Leather is available at a very budget-friendly pricing point
This pair of kicks is comfortable footwear right out of the box, perfect for standing or walking all day, according to a significant number of wearers
“Cute,” “pretty,” “attractive,” “gorgeous,” “awesome,” “wonderful,” “sophisticated,” “adorable” and “stylish” are among the words used to describe the shoe by many buyers
Several customers share that they get compliments from wearing this kind of Keds sneakers
A few users appreciate that the Keds Crashback Leather is easy to clean
Like other Keds lifestyle shoes, it has a versatile design that can go with a variety of casual clothing
A user has noted that the leather could hold up against sweaty feet or muddy sidewalks
The toe area is surprisingly roomy, as reviewed by a tester
cons: When it comes to width, the Keds Crashback Leather fits narrow and tight, as commented by several users
A tester said that this footwear lacks support

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7.5, these however are super snug on me—particularly around the outer knuckle of my pinky toe. These definitely wouldn’t fit anyone with feet wider or thicker than average, or with larger toes. The soles of my feet feel like they’re being pinned against the cushion of the shoe, which makes it hard to even tell if the cushion itself is even comfortable. I have two pairs of champion canvas Keds and the 7.5 fits perfectly. I don’t like wearing shoes without socks, and these would be way too tight for them. I’ll return and try an 8 or 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: OUCH! The side cuts right over ankle bone!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute on, love the look but WOW, the side comes up VERY high and cuts right over the bone. In less that a minutes of having them on, I had a red spot. I knew they had to go back. Now if I had no other options, I would have honestly cut the side down myself lol...but because of the previous reviews, I also ordered a similar pair by another company (Kenneth Cole Vida elastic) and I actually love those - great fit - so these Keds are going back!
customer_reviews.author: Legare

customer_reviews.title: Great look for any occasion - love Keds
customer_reviews.text: These shoes ran narrow at the part where one would have a bunion if one had one. They are REALLY cute - great for work or casual. Unfortunately, I had foot surgery a few years ago for a broken big toe and that area is very sensitive to pressure so I could not wear these. They are a great looking shoe and I am very disappointed I have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Crandell

customer_reviews.title: Fabric  on upper leather so won't stretch.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5 or sometimes a 10 but usually a 10 is more comfortable for Keds, so that's what I ordered. I had slight slipping on the heel of my slightly smaller foot, but the width across the ball of both feet was just snug enough that I don't think I could comfortably size down. The interior fabric is sewn to the top of the shoe as well, so you won't have the ability to stretch the upper leather to adjust the fit. If not for the slipping on the one heel I would have kept them. I do like the look.
customer_reviews.author: holland1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual leather shoe!
customer_reviews.text: When looking online to purchase leather sneakers, these popped up during my search. These leather crashbacks looked a lot (to my eyes) like the Frye Dylan sneaker, but at a fraction of the cost. I am a big fan of the Keds ballet style shoes (the "Teacup Flat", and from several years ago, the "Eleanor".... Ked Company, please bring them back!!!), so I decided to give these "crashbacks" a try. I love them! I found them both very comfortable, and extremely cute. I bought the cognac color, and plan to buy them in black as well. They fit like typical Keds, true to size, but maybe slightly wider than other shoes. Just get them, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: OpinionsRLike...

customer_reviews.title: SOFT LEATHER SHOE
customer_reviews.text: These are leather shoes, which should last forever!! They are perfect for in-between seasons. After first wear they stretch to conform to your foot. I cut out the elastic on the sides of the tops cuz it made them way too tight. They do not slip and do not fall off your feet. I have had a stroke and it is very important that I wear shoes that are pretty low in heel and cushion your foot. These do all that and more!! I have two pairs just in case I ever run out....
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were tight at first, but I wore them twice and now love them
customer_reviews.text: This was my initial review; "They're good looking, but fit a bit tight. I'm hoping they'll stretch. They don't have that soft comfy Keds quality that I'm used to so maybe they're defected Keds?" However after breaking them in properly I completely love them. They are everything I love about Keds; comfy for hours and hours of walking around the City and look good with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Opheliaaaa

customer_reviews.title: This Shoe is Big
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a pair of Keds slip-ons for decades. Mine finally became to cruddy to wear and I bought another pair. However, this new pair of Keds slip-ons were huge. They were entirely too wide and the entire shoe was too big. If I had ordered another size, my toe would have been crushed. I have a narrow foot, but these shoes used to fit. Now they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful and fits well but it has zero breathability. I have never been a sweaty feet person, and my shoes are never stinky but this material is so rigid and keeps your feet sweltering all the time. I became so self-conscious that to wear them I use additional shoe insoles that i know are more breathable which makes the shoes a bit tighter.
customer_reviews.author: GGMBA

customer_reviews.title: Cute Keds
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes and I have tried to stretch the top so it will be more comfortable. They cut off the circulation across the top of my foot. I don't think I have particularly high arches but these shoes really cut into the top of my feet. I did all the tricks to stretch them. I put them in the freezer, warmed them with a hairdryer while stretching them and that helped.
customer_reviews.author: Van Gogh

customer_reviews.title: My go to shoes
customer_reviews.text: Original post 7/1/19 - I really enjoy these will probably have to buy another pair, I wear these to work everyday extremely comfortable. Update 10/25/19 - I do like these shoes & I wear them to only to work, I sit down at a desk 8 hr shift so I'm not on my feet all day, needless to say the quality doesn't justify the cost. I decided to order a second pair because again I do like these, however if the soles wear down, I will not spend another $60 & will look elsewhere. Take a look at the photos attached.
customer_reviews.author: 80sbabees

customer_reviews.title: My favorite everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have them in brown and black now. And will probably buy another pair of the brown soon as I’ve worn them almost daily for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great show but they were clearly used
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. However, they were clearly worn before. Creases on the leather and the bottoms were dirty. They were not even wrapped correctly in the box. It stink because I really needed these. I kept them but some type of a refund would have been nice. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kritter

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile investment
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this was a lot to pay for simple slip-on shoes but these were very much worth the price. They are a great summer wardrobe addition, more durable than expected, and appear to be getting even more comfortable as I wear them. You really do get what you pay for in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Slip-On Keds With Better Durability
customer_reviews.text: One of the best moves Keds ever made was to produce their classic shoe in washable leather. My go-to shoe for casual times. I wear them until they are ratty and buy a new pair. Only negative is the lack of arch support.
customer_reviews.author: GVLchick29607

customer_reviews.title: Keds Women's Crashback Slip On
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, slips on easily, only regret is I ordered a size up based on reviews and it's a bit looser than wanted but not a big deal. I wear it often and no complaints, would order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia

customer_reviews.title: Love these Keds!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stylishly yet durable flats! Received a few compliments on them already! Great way to dress up jeans without wearing heels! Did I mention, I Love them already! Well, what did you expect from Keds!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: S. McSherry

customer_reviews.title: Runs very narrow and small
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these Keds! But they run much smaller than any other Keds I've bought and they're very narrow. I usually wear a 7 and a half wide but got a size 8 which usually works fine for me. I couldn't get my foot in! I returned it and bought an 8 and a half. It fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Afficianado

customer_reviews.title: True cognac. Good shoe overall.
customer_reviews.text: To clarify any confusions with the color- this was cognac indeed, not a darker brown as some other reviews mention. Very comfy, although the edges around the back of the foot/ around the ankles are a little coarse and might rub on or abrade the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Passerby

customer_reviews.title: New Favourite
customer_reviews.text: Keds never disappoints. These slip on leather Keds perfect right out of the box. I wore them all day with only a thin liner sock. No sore feet, no blisters. I love them! So cute with a pair of skinny jeans or capris. I just ordered another pair in brown! Love, love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Shoe for Work When you can't wear open toed shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great summer shoe for work. We can't wear open toed shoes so these look like a summer shoe but still offer protection. They seemed a little snug in the beginning so I wore a thin sock (Peds) with them for the first week. They stretched and now look a little broke in and are very comfortable. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love how versatile the color of the shoes goes with almost all of my outfits. Was surprised by how comfy and soft the inside of the shoe is too. Toms are my favorite shoes because of how comfy they are, but I will have to say that Keds are now on the top of my list.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They do have a break-in period...but just get more and more comfy each wear. I’d say they run true to size, and narrow. I’m usually a 6-6.5 with narrow feet and I purchased a size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Scott&Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: If these had a little more arch support and came in Red, would be a 5 start winner. Still very cute, comfy. Not quite 5 stars for me yet, although my second pair (tan color). Bought a red pair of Softinos for soooo much more money (could have had 3 pair of Keds!), but had much nicer leather too. Would have been happy to have a red pair of these though.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Most adorable, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! The most comfortable shoes and super cute with summer dresses. Wore these all over Europe walking 5+ miles a day. They were the only shoes that I wore regularly for the trip
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't dislike anything. And I bought them because I wanted to wear them. This is actually a repeat purchase. I bought my first black pair two years ago and since they are beginning to wear out, I ordered them again.
customer_reviews.author: Constance P. Drescher

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and they don’t hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and quality are very nice, this is my second pair in this color. I literally wore my first pair out over the course of 2 and a half years.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B Romero

customer_reviews.title: Go for your largest size!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to go for a 9.5 (usually a 9 or 9.5) Still a little tight in the toes, but otherwise comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and great support! Highly recommend 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I loved the comfort and support of these Keds. I liked them so much I bought them in two colors, as well for daughter also. She is completely sold on these awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Candyce C Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Not good for price
customer_reviews.text: Thought they would be great to walk through the airport but my feet were not comfortable at all at end of day. Will be wearing them around the house :-/
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality compared to past Keds
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in these shoes...very thin leather, no support, poor cushioning, much poorer quality than the canvas KEDS I have from last year. I have a narrower foot and these gap on the sides. Just nothing like good KEDS.
customer_reviews.author: PhoenixPA

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. Wore them to New Orleans and walked 368239 miles. They are really cute and comfortable. Kinda make my feet smell a little tho lol.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I bought the camel/cognac and black. I get compliments every time I wear them, and they have great arch support. I can wear them with jeans, work pants, dresses, or skirts. The leather is super durable and I don't worry about walking through the grass or in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Earles

customer_reviews.title: These are ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work. My job is very active, walking around 10,000 steps during the work day so I wanted a supportive comfortable shoe that also looks nice. You have to wear liner socks with these shoes but even with the liners I think the shoes are just a little too stiff and narrow. Basically, I feel like the shoes need to be broken in which is a bummer as I’m on my feet all day :(
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Sent them back
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my Mom she thought they were cut to low and there was stitching by the elastic gore that pinched her foot.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, simple pair of comfy (but not stodgy) shoes. Easy to slip on with jeans and khakis. I bought black and they’re cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi and Mom

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow so I had to return. They fit fine but they looked funny around the toe box due to the stretch.
customer_reviews.author: GatorGirl01

customer_reviews.title: Old Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to pay this price so I tried a few other cheaper pairs and ended up keeping and loving these. Good fit, comfort and style. Old reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Seaside Designer

customer_reviews.title: Slipped off heel
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe was good, but the left shoe slipped off my heel when walking. Loved the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: Speech Girl

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Feels Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks so nice it could be worn with nice casual, and fits so well that you also have comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: They are very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium to narrow foot and these are way to narrow for comfort. My ankles also got sore while wearing them just around the house for a few minutes to test.
customer_reviews.author: ms324AW

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes and fit true to size in my case. Very cute with jeans or leggings, not clunky at all. I would have given five stars but the leather is a little stiffer than I expected. I've only just tried them on and so I'm hoping the leather will soften up with some wear.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O.

customer_reviews.title: Very ugly shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are literally ugly as hell don’t buy unless you’re an ugly white mom they would fit you perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Anna De Leon

customer_reviews.title: da best
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes to fit my wide-ish feet. Great out of the box. This is my second pair
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: my most valued shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a weird pinky thing. most shoes squeeze my pinky and causes so much pain but these I've bought for the 4th time in about 3 years and I wear them a lot and they are like clouds on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Lacye Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before sizing up
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a half size larger than I usually wear because Keds sometimes fit a little tight but it wasn't necessary in this style. Super cute, comfy shoes go with just about everything.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, but...
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size. Yhey are very pretty on the cognac color. Although they are leather, the shoe is very breathable. They crease and look beat up quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.T3acher

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: A little right on the top of the foot, but I get so many compliments and these are so cozy
customer_reviews.author: Meredythe T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute for casual work dresses
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up thinking they'd run small. But they are big. Put an insert in and they fit pretty good. Better too big than too small.
customer_reviews.author: chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Def 1/2 size down but LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: Love these but def size down a half size at least. all the reviewers saying to size down are correct. I wish I would have! I also have these in the brown!! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, and well made, but not designed for everyone's foot. Seems to be stylized more for petite women. Recommend going up a full size when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Keds
customer_reviews.text: I love my Canvas Keds the fit wasn't real good on these
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kish

customer_reviews.title: True to size and color.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little loose in the heel but otherwise great!True to size and
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Extremely comfortable and break in nicely! Can’t wait to get a black pair now.
customer_reviews.author: dmc0708

customer_reviews.title: Fake Keds?
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much, that I had to order a second pair after my first ones got worn out. They looked great when I received them, but I jsut noticed the Keds logo on the right shoe is upside down. It is really obvious now that I noticed it, and makes me question whether or not these are fake.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love! My new go-to shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love! I normally wear a 7.5 and got these in a 7.5 and the fit was right. In the beginning, the were a little tight and rubbed under in ankle, but I just wore them around the house for several hours in thick socks and they’ve fit and felt good ever since. My new fave shoes
customer_reviews.author: IAGibson

customer_reviews.title: tight on widest part of feet but heel may cause blisters
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and it was tight on my feet but then had a gap that was roughing my heel too much as I walked around the house to test them out. I returned them as I think they will cause blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My dog chewed mine up, i gotta get a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: ohyeah123

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am about to order another pair, and this will be my third pair. I just wear them everywhere because they are so light and easy to slip on and off, but they aren't like normal lazy slip on shoes they are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Branham

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Thought the color would be too dark but actually like the color. Good for a narrow fit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Construction
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn them yet but they are visually a nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.author: Venice Worker

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is a Christmas gift for my niece. She wears her sister’s shoes identical to these all the time and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather_318

customer_reviews.title: I m sorry to write not a good review for this item that I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I m sorry to write not a good review for this item that I have purchased, I have tried them but unfortunately the right shoe it hurts in the upper side of the toe because it seams to have a sewing or some thing not perfect, so my toe didn’t felt good, That’s all I have to said, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: silvana

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather
customer_reviews.text: A little tight, but they are stretching—I have a bunion
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kinnard

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe. This was my third purchase of this shoe. I love them. I wear them all summer and fall. I seem to remember them being a bit snug but fit nicely after one or two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M. Long

customer_reviews.title: Love them - 1/2 size up needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a whole size up, they fit great at first but so let out as you wear. 1/2 size up would have better for me! I love these shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I love keds and have I couldn't say how many pairs. But these...look classy and nice and go with all my outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. English

customer_reviews.title: Aren’t holding up well
customer_reviews.text: The footbed is already breaking down after just 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Christie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a great color! I wear 8.5-9, and these fit well in an 8.5. Not really any arch support, but I can still wear them all day and not have aching feet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: Must have for me
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t go into Summer without them! Been wearing in place of tie sneakers for years
customer_reviews.author: Maureen R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slide on and off; Great color
customer_reviews.text: The color of these is perfect! I ordered 2 other similar style shoes in different brands and I picked to keep these Keds and send back the others. I like that the front part of the shoe doesn’t go back to far which makes them easy to slide on and off and looks so stylish with skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, a little large
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be nice quality and are comfortable to walk around in but are much cuter than regular sneakers. I'm planning on bringing them on a trip to Europe. I have a narrow foot and wear a size 8 in Converse and Nike's. I ordered these in a 7.5 and they fit nicely and are even a little roomy. I would definitely order a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I wear them with no show socks and don't get blisters. They are comfortable and go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE them! I need to buy in different colors, because this ia all I want to wear now lol
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Durable Shoe for Everyday Wear
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes to work at least several times a week; leather rather than fabric uppers give them a clean look. Didn’t think I’d be in Keds again at my age, but I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Telleson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneaker but they are very narrow so I gave them away.
customer_reviews.author: Dee2

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!~
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Perfect fit, look great with or without socks. My new go to weekend footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality leather
customer_reviews.text: These were very narrow and didnt hold up. Horrible quality
customer_reviews.author: wklong

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are okay shoes for the price. Maybe look a tad cheap but overall okay.
customer_reviews.author: RainbowG5

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to wear them in!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly narrow, but need to worn in! I have previously ordered a my normal size and they were too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but rubbed my feet raw in several places.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hannah Edelstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair from this seller, but second pair of this shoe! Leather is great quality and fit is very comfortable. Will probably purchase again when these are worn in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They are so comfortable and I love the slip ons
customer_reviews.author: marleine carnogursky

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is amzing and fits perfect too.. bought size 5.. wish it comes in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Islam

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these shoes. They are super comfortable and have a great fit. The heel of shoes like this can sometimes be too wide allowing the shoe to slip. That is not the case and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Feuerstein

customer_reviews.title: Runs VERY small!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these shoes! I am usually a 5-6 women’s shoe but I am ordering a 7.5. I returned my first pair that I bought in a 6. They were way way way too small!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was expecting, they look great and feel good as well.
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Probably fake!
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be fake! They’re u comfortable and the stitching is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Blisters on heels
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute but they dig into my ankles and make them bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Godwin

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter liked them and they fit her well
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter liked them and they fit her well. They are size 7 and she wears size 6. Ordered for myself but they were too tight.
customer_reviews.author: cindeebea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes from the minute I put them on!
customer_reviews.author: Marquita Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I love these! This is my third pair
customer_reviews.text: I love these! This is my third pair. They are very comfortable and true to size. The leather is soft and the cognac is a gorgeous color.
customer_reviews.author: JACKIE HINES

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Fit true to size for me
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Fit true to size for me. No blisters or rubbing. Break in quickly. The white soles/sides does get dirty quickly but I don’t mind, as these are casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Can be uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sides rub against my ankle bone and causing blister.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA OCHOA-RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and the fit is true to size. They are exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: gloria denise rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: Sized up a half size based on other reviews, glad I did. Happy with the purchase, I get lots of compliments on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: techfan

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable, ill fitting
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is uncomfortable and not true to size. seems cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: John May

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these Keds!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color (I got cognac brown). My new favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thomas

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Crashback Leather Sneaker
product_meta.description: Slip on upper, ortholite foot bed, feminine last
feature_bullets: Durable rubber outsole for added comfort
